gr.uop

Class MTServer.Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • gr.uop.MTServer.Player
  • Enclosing class:
    MTServer

    public class MTServer.Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Registered player data. One for each player/king name, color, playernumber, plauersocket for each client connected a new player object created by accept() socket when 2 players game mode, then each client registers a second player
